entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 10:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy except snow at times heavy inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm except snowfall amount 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain except snow inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the afternoon. Snow inland and over higher terrain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023
